title: Standard Basis Vectors
text: The e vectors denote the standard basis vectors, where all components are $$0$$ except for the nth component for $$e_n$$ that is equal to $$1$$.

title: Domain Dimension
text: Since the linear function has a domain of $$R^3$$, the coefficient vectors a have three components

title: Linear Function
text: The nth component of the coefficient vector of a is the value of the function evaluated at the nth elementary basis vector.

title: First Component
text: What is the first component of a?
